When the Devatas and Yakshas of Kailasa were forced to leave the world, their Lord was trapped by the Pantokrator. The Destroyer of Worlds is a huge four-armed divinity reawakened to destroy the world that wronged him in ages past. The Destroyer is armed with weapons of iron and lightning. Death and disease are his to give and bestow.
